intro.text: A pleasant aura surrounds this man. He seems eager to speak to you.

response.text: I haven't made a lot of progress on them. But they sound interesting! Save lives, make money, win-win right? I really want to look into it, but you see, I'm no ghoul hunter, just some clumsy egghead, so I have no test subjects. It would be nice if we had some ghouls in captivity...
I have some serum for sale, if you want.

option.title: Artyom
option.text: There is an infected man called Artyom locked up in the cellar. He's about to turning into a ghoul.

response.text: Ah, yes! I forgot about him. He makes a great test subject because his brain is in-between human and ghoul state, which is very useful for finding out how the transition works. So, the brain...
I need you to get it for me. Go put him out of his misery and bring me the brain. Be careful - the brain must be intact for my research. Don't ruin it.

option.title: Research
option.text: What research are you doing with his brain?

response.text: I'm making a serum that can temporarily protect you from the Visitation.
Good day! What brings you here?

option.title: Help
option.text: Sidorovich said you needed some help.

option.title: Document
option.text: I found this journal in the church.

response.text: Ah, yes! I appreciate your offer. I'm working on a device, a detector that can warn you before you step into an anomaly. And my intention is simple - I just want to make some money selling it, to be honest.

Building this device is not easy, though. First I needed money to buy components. I got help from folks in Zernaskaya - they each gave me some money and in return I'll give them the device for free. I call it "crowd funding", you see?

option.title: Money
option.text: So you need money from me?

response.text: No, not money - that has been taken care of. I need data. Each anomaly is different and the detector must posess a set of parameters for each type of anomaly to detect it. There used to be a man whom they called "The Priest", I heard that he did some research on the anomalies.
He was a legend, and there are a lot of stories about him. You can ask around the camp and people will tell you all about him. But he hasn't been seen or heard from since last year.

I don't know why they call him "The Priest", but I guess it's because he lived in the church. I believe he has some documents there of his study. If you could retrieve the documents for me, that will really help with my progress.

option.title: Sure
option.text: Sure, I can do that for you.

option.title: Not right now
option.text: Not at this time, I'm busy with something else.

response.text: Terrific! The church is northwest of the village, near the barn house. Be careful though, that area is infested with Ghouls.
No problem! Let me know if you change your mind.

Let me see! Hmm, a lot of text about his spirituality struggles. He did run into several anomalies, here and there, and lived to tell the tale. Good, I'll study the journal more, and I'll let you know when I make further progress with my detector. So thank you! By the way, was there anything anomalous inside the church?

option.title: Anomaly
option.text: I saw a floating orb that shoots out eletric bolts to metal objects.

response.text: That would be odd. The church door was sealed, so there must be something dangerous inside!
Interesting. Alright, I will add a sensor that can detect ionized air particles.

Let me have a look... Aha! This is the missing link to my serum! Well thanks to you, now we have a better chance to live through future Visitations. Artyom's sacrifice was not in vain. Here, you can have a sample of the serum, and you can buy more from me if you need it.
